mapper.insert: insert into c_clue( id, owner, company, salutation, `name`, `position`, email, companyExtension, companyWebsite, phone, clueStatus, clueSource, description, contactMinute, nextContactTime, detailAddress, createTime, createBy ) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{salutation}, #{name}, #{position}, #{email}, #{companyExtension}, #{companyWebsite}, #{phone}, #{clueStatus}, #{clueSource}, #{description}, #{contactMinute}, #{nextContactTime}, #{detailAddress}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
mapper.select:
select cl.id, cl.name, u.name as owner, cl.salutation, cl.company, cl.position, cl.email, cl.companyExtension, cl.companyWebsite, cl.phone, cl.clueStatus, cl.clueSource, cl.description, cl.contactMinute, cl.nextContactTime, cl.detailAddress
from c_clue cl join c_user u on cl.owner = u.id
and cl.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner} ,'%')
and cl.company like concat('%', #{company} ,'%')
and cl.companyExtension like concat('%', #{companyExtension} ,'%')
and cl.phone like concat('%', #{phone} ,'%')
and cl.clueSource like concat('%', #{clueSource} ,'%')
and cl.clueStatus like concat('%', #{clueStatus} ,'%')
order by cl.createTime desc
limit #{skipCount}, #{pageSize}

select count(*)
from c_clue cl join c_user u on cl.owner = u.id
and cl.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner} ,'%')
and cl.company like concat('%', #{company} ,'%')
and cl.companyExtension like concat('%', #{companyExtension} ,'%')
and cl.phone like concat('%', #{phone} ,'%')
and cl.clueSource like concat('%', #{clueSource} ,'%')
and cl.clueStatus like concat('%', #{clueStatus} ,'%')

select
c.id, c.name, c.salutation, u.name as owner, c.company, c.position, c.email, c.companyExtension, c.companyWebsite, c.phone, c.clueStatus, c.clueSource, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.description, c.contactMinute, c.nextContactTime, c.detailAddress
from c_clue c join c_user u on c.owner = u.id
where c.id = #{id}
